thread.title: Binky Felstead confesses pregnancy is 'the best surprise' following announcement she and JP are expecting first baby
thread.title_full: Binky Felstead confesses pregnancy is 'the best surprise' following announcement she and JP are expecting first baby

author: Hayley Minn
title: Binky Felstead confesses pregnancy is 'the best surprise' following announcement she and JP are expecting first baby
text:
Binky Felstead confesses pregnancy is 'the best surprise' following announcement she and JP are expecting first baby The on-off Made In Chelsea couple are going to have their first child together Share Get celebs   
Binky Felstead has revealed her pregnancy is "the best surprise", following the announcement she's expecting her first child with Josh 'JP' Patterson. 
The on-off Made In Chelsea couple earlier revealed the happy news they're having their first baby together. 
And, referencing her and JP's pet names for each other, Binky tweeted: "When you get the best surprise you never knew you always wanted ... There's a little 'buh' on the way." 
She added a snap of her and JP posing with her baby bump. Read More Binky Felstead pregnant with Josh 'JP' Patterson's baby - but they're still not officially a couple 
The reality TV stars announced the happy news in Hello! magazine , saying: "It’s obviously been a huge shock to both of us. 
“This is a new start and a new chapter in our lives. I want to be a little family, to be honest. But I'm going to be okay either way. 
“Whatever happens, this baby is not going to be affected. And I know Josh will be part of the baby’s life whether we are together or not. We are a unit now." Read More Made In Chelsea's Ollie Locke launching gay dating app to rival Grindr so he can find perfect man 
And JP went on to add the couple are taking everything slowly when it comes to their future - despite having a baby on the way. 
He said: "Where we're both being very mature is with the fact that you should never get back together just because there's a baby in the picture. It has to be for the right reasons. 
"We love each other a great deal, and there's no pressure – but you do have to take the past into consideration, where there have been a few hiccups. 
"We're just taking it very easy." Like us on Facebook
